1.title: IMDb at the Golden Globes 2019

episode of.title: IMDb at the Golden Globes (TV Series 2018– )

1.plot: Dave Karger hosts IMDb's Golden Globes 2019 coverage from the red carpet.

2.title: Golden Globe-Winner Richard Madden Talks Reuniting With "Bodyguard" Co-Star

episode of.title: IMDb at the Golden Globes (TV Series 2018– )

2.plot: "Bodyguard" star - and Golden Globe winner for Best Actor in a TV Drama - Richard Madden talks with IMDb about working with Keeley Hawes almost 20 years after they co-starred in the movie 'Complicity.' Plus he shares his top picks for who should sit atop the Iron Throne as "Game of Thrones" wraps.

3.title: Glenn Close Praises the Women Who Made The Wife Possible

episode of.title: IMDb at the Golden Globes (TV Series 2018– )

3.plot: Glenn Close, who won the Best Actress in a Drama Golden Globe, thanks the female crew members who helped the movie get made, while director Björn Runge reveals that the movie would not have been made without Close's participation.

4.title: Stephan James Talks "Homecoming" With Julia Roberts, 'If Beale Street Could Talk

episode of.title: IMDb at the Golden Globes (TV Series 2018– )

4.plot: Stephan James talks about his communication with "Homecoming" co-star Julia Roberts when they discovered they had both been nominated for Golden Globes, as well as the trickiness of being nominated for two different projects in the same year.

5.title: Elsie Fisher and Bo Burnham Talk One Surprising Year of 'Eighth Grade'

episode of.title: IMDb at the Golden Globes (TV Series 2018– )

5.plot: Golden Globe nominee Elsie Fisher and her 'Eighth Grade' writer/director Bo Burnham discuss the unexpected success of the movie from its Sundance debut to its awards-season bow.

6.title: Golden Globe Stars Reveal Dream TV & Film Roles

episode of.title: IMDb at the Golden Globes (TV Series 2018– )

6.plot: On the Golden Globes red carpet, Stephan James, Laura Dern, and other nominees reveal which TV and movie roles they coveted the most this year.

7.title: Caitriona Balfe, Sam Elliott, and KiKi Layne Give Advice to Their Younger Selves

episode of.title: IMDb at the Golden Globes (TV Series 2018– )

7.plot: In honor of 15-year-old nominee Elsie Fisher, Caitriona Balfe, Sam Elliott, KiKi Layne, and other stars at the 2019 Golden Globes share the advice they'd give to their younger selves.

8.title: Rachel Brosnahan Gives Play-by-Play of Her 2019 Golden Globes Win

episode of.title: IMDb at the Golden Globes (TV Series 2018– )

8.plot: Golden Globe-winner Rachel Brosnahan gives us the lowdown of her 2019 Best Actress - Comedy or Musical win for "The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel."

1.title: IMDb at the Golden Globes 2018

episode of.title: IMDb at the Golden Globes (TV Series 2018– )

1.plot: Dave Karger hosts IMDb's Golden Globes 2018 coverage from the red carpet.

imdb.title: IMDb at the Golden Globes
plot: IMDb brings you comprehensive coverage of the Golden Globe _Awards_ (qv), featuring interviews with nominees, plus on-the-ground coverage of the red carpet, and more.
